author: By JENNIFER PELTZ Associated Press
title: 2 cats in NY become first US pets to test positive for coronavirus
description: Two pet cats in New York state have tested positive for the coronavirus, marking the first confirmed cases in companion animals in the United States, federal officials said Wednesday.
content: Coronavirus testing for pets isnt recommended unless an animal has been exposed to a person with COVID-19 and the animal has symptoms of the disease and tests have ruled out more common possible causes, said Dr. Jane Rooney of the USDA. Veterinarians who thin… [+1206 chars]
